actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, and in addition, to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Ways and Means and Foreign Affairs
actions.text: Mr. Markey asked unanimous consent that the bill, H.R. 3399, be re-referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition, to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Ways and Means and Foreign Affairs. Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Ways and Means, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Rereferred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Ways and Means, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to House Ways and Means

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To prohibit the use, production, sale, importation, or exportation of any pesticide containing atrazine.

summary.text: Prohibits the use, production, sale, importation, or exportation of atrazine (pesticide chemical 2-chloro-4-ethylamine-6-isopropylamin-1,3,5-triazine) or an atrazine product.

titles.title: To prohibit the use, production, sale, importation, or exportation of any pesticide containing atrazine.
